item.title: Travelgatex: TravelgateX
item.description:
The TravelgateX platform lets you build lightening fast applications and websites that connect to a wide range of travel suppliers in realtime. Integrations to new suppliers take less than 2 days to connect, rather than 2 weeks. Once the integration is in place, response times for showing hotel bookings is in the milliseconds, regardless of the size of the hotel booking database. <a href="/travelgatex/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>TravelgateX Platform Information</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/concepts/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-question-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Concepts</h3> <p>Understand TravelgateX basic concepts</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/reference/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-book"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Reference</h3> <p>Reference Documentation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/security/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-shield"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Security</h3> <p>Authorization &amp; Authentication</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/data-automation/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-database"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Data Automation</h3> <p>Automate bulk data operations</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/tutorials/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Tutorials</h3> <p>Walkthrouhgs of common applications</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/release-notes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-map"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Release Notes</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/resources/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-file-text"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Resources</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/travelgatex/frequently-asked-questions/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-question-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">FAQs</h3> <p>Do you have specific questions about TravelgateX?

item.title: Getting-Started: Getting Started
item.description:
Welcome to TravelgateX! Learn the basics of using our APIs, and start building integrations quickly and securely. <a href="/getting-started/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>See how the TravelgateX platform and APIs fit together</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/getting-started/quickstart/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-clock-o"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Quickstart</h3> <p>How to get support for using our APIs</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/getting-started/concepts/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-question-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Concepts</h3> <p>Basic concepts for all of the TravelgateX platform</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/getting-started/playground/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-play"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Playground</h3> <p>Try our API now</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/getting-started/learning-graphql/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Learning GraphQL</h3> </div> </div> </a> With TravelgateX you can:

item.title: Distribution: Distribution
item.description:
Distribution allows you, as a Seller, to manage pricing rules, filters and blacklists for each of your Buyers connected via TravelgateX. These rules can be applied at a channel, hotel or booking level, as well as applied to specific date ranges or markets, giving you the power to configure your companyâ€™s distribution strategy in a simple, user-friendly interface. Distribution rules will help your company maximise benefits while growing the overall sales by managing pricing and filters for each of your customers.
[...]

item.title: Logging: Logging
item.description: Logging is log managament tool available to all Partners using TravelgateX. <a href="/logging/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Logging Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/logging/howtos/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">How-to guides</h3> <p>Perform specific tasks</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/logging/reference/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-book"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Reference</h3> <p>Reference Documentation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/logging/release-notes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-map"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Release Notes</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Stats: Stats
item.description: Stats is a powerful data product that will let you evaluate real-time minute-by-minute buyer and/or seller performance. role=“alert”>Join us on Slack to discuss your integrations, or ask us questions via our Jira Service desk.<a href="/stats/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Stats Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/stats/howtos/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">How-to guides</h3> <p>Perform specific tasks</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/stats/reference/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-book"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Reference</h3> <p>Reference Documentation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/stats/release-notes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-map"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Release Notes</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Insights-X: Insights
item.description: Insights is a powerful data solution that will let you get back in control of your business. The innovative way we store, manage and process data allows us to produce real-time data, historical trends and forecast the travel industry to match your own needs.

item.title: Alerts-X: Alerts
item.description: Alerts is a monitoring App which monitors any unusual performance accroding to the criteria you set for that connection. <a href="/alerts-x/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Alerts Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/alerts-x/reference/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-book"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Reference</h3> <p>Reference Documentation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/alerts-x/howtos/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">How-to guides</h3> <p>Perform specific tasks</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/alerts-x/release-notes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-map"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Release Notes</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Flight-X: Flight-X
item.description: Is a new fast, easy, one-stop NDC 19.1 API for flight shopping and booking. With Flight-X, you can connect to multiple NDC and non-NDC Suppliers and add business logic to reflect your pricing and unique offers. There are no integration costs and you can integrate with hundreds of flights Suppliers. <a href="/flight-x/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Flight-X Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/flight-x/reference/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-book"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">API Reference</h3> <p>Reference Documentation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/flight-x/methods/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list-alt"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Methods</h3> <p>Flight-X Methods</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/flight-x/release-notes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-map"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Release Notes</h3> <p>New Updates &amp; Releases</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: : Credits
item.description:
github contributors Other contributors Packages and libraries Bootstrap - front-end framework mermaid - generation of diagram and flowchart from text in a similar manner as markdown font awesome - the iconic font and CSS framework jQuery - The Write Less, Do More, JavaScript Library lunr - Lunr enables you to provide a great search experience without the need for external, server-side, search services… JavaScript-autoComplete - An extremely lightweight and powerful vanilla JavaScript completion suggester.
